children.name: Introduction
Monitor and analyze your Spending Behaviour

blocks.text: This Dashboard looks at the overall end-to-end time of a standard Procure-to-Pay process in Ariba as well as shows the spending behavior for various portions of the process, this breakdown can be used to identify bottlenecks in your process. The analysis focus on Purchase Requisition (PR) as well as Purchase Order (PO)
Page 1: Key metrics to get a picture of the health of Procure-to-Pay Spending behavior.
Page 2: Deep dive into further analysis of your Spending behavior
Page 3:  A closer look into Catalog vs. non-Catalog Items
Page 4: A list of Case details in order to look further into root causes.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: Additional Dashboards Available

blocks.text: For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.

children.name: Overview
Process Discovery
PO Total Amount Spend
Number of POs

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Id")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of PO Items
Total Amount of Open Overdue Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL)
	AND "Last Invoice Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Suppliers
Number of PRs

dataSource.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT "Last PR Id") FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Top 10 Suppliers

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") AS "Total PO Amount", 
"PO Item Supplier ID" AS "Vendor Name"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "PO Item Supplier ID" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: PO Item Category by No. of suppliers and Total Spend

dataSource.query:
SELECT "PO Item Category", 
COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Item Supplier ID") AS "Number of Suppliers",
SUM("PO Item Total Amount") AS "Total Spend"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Order BY 2 DESC

children.name: Number of Invoice without PO

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id")FILTER (WHERE "PO ID" IS NULL) AS "# PO without Invoice"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of PO without PR

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(DISTINCT "PO ID")FILTER (WHERE "Last PR Id" IS NULL) AS "# PO without PR"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Invoice without discount

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id")FILTER (WHERE "Last Invoice Item Discount Amount" = 0) AS "# Invoice without discount"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of PR Item ordered despite being denied

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Deny PR Item' ~> 'Order PR Item')) AS "# Deny PR -> Order PR"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Deep Dive
Total Spend Over Time by Business Unit

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter",
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") AS "PO Item Total Amount", 
"PO Business Unit"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('QUARTER')
LIMIT 500

children.name: Total Spend Over Time by PO Item Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('QUARTER', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter",
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") AS "PO Item Total Amount", 
"PO Item Line Type"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('QUARTER')
LIMIT 500

children.name: Total Spend by PO Supplier (Top 10)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") AS "Total PO Amount", 
AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"PO Item Supplier ID" AS "PO Supplier"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: Total Spend by PO Material (Top 10)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") AS "Total PO Amount", 
AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Avg. Cycle Time",
"PO Material Number" 
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

children.name: PO Total Amount Invoiced
Total spend PO Amount Discount
PO Total Amount Spend
PO Total Tax Amount Invoiced
Total Last Invoice Item Discount Amount
Last Invoice Item Estimated Savings
Receipt Item Total Amount
PO Confirmation Status by PO Type
children.description: Exclude NULL: Can be customised per case

children.name: Maverick Buying Rate
children.description: Definition: Whenever the PO Item is created after the Invoice is created, it is considered "Maverick Buying"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Receive Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: KPIs

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(DISTINCT "PO ID")FILTER (WHERE "Last Invoice Created Date" IS NULL) AS "# PO without Invoice",
COUNT(DISTINCT "PO ID")FILTER (WHERE "Last PR Id" IS NULL) AS "# PO without PR",
COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id")FILTER (WHERE "PO ID" IS NULL) AS "# Invoice without PO",
COUNT(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id")FILTER (WHERE "Last Invoice Item Discount Amount" = 0) AS "# Invoice without discount",
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PO Item' ~> 'Create PR Item')) AS "# Create PO Item -> Create PR Item",
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Deny PR Item' ~> 'Order PR Item')) AS "# Deny PR -> Order PR",
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Receive Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')) AS "# Receive Invoice -> Create PO Item"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Catalog vs. Non Catalog
PO Spend on Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog') AS "PO Spend on Catalog"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: PO Spend on Non Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog') AS "PO Spend on Non Catalog"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: % of PO Spend on Catalog Items
children.description: PO spend associated with non catalog as a % of total spend originating from Ariba

dataSource.query:
SELECT
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") 
FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Total Amount") 
* 100   
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: % of PO Spend on Non Catalog Items
children.description: PO spend associated with non catalog as a % of total spend originating from Ariba

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("PO Item Total Amount") FILTER (
  	WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog'
	) 
/   
SUM("PO Item Total Amount") 
* 100   
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: No. of PO Items on Catalog

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of PO Item"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'

children.name: No. of PO Items on Non Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT
COUNT(case_id) AS "No. of PO Item"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog'

children.name: PO Amount Billed on Catalog items

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Amount Billed") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog') AS "PO Spend on Catalog"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: PO Amount Billed on Non Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM ("PO Amount Billed") FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog') AS "PO Spend on NonCatalog"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"

children.name: Open Invoices for Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id") 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE 
"Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL
AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'

children.name: Open Invoices for Non Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(DISTINCT "Last Invoice Id") 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE 
"Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL
AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog'

children.name: Invoice Rejection Rate on Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) 
FILTER (WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status"  = 'Rejected'
AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog')/
count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: PO Item line type deep dive

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Item Line Type",
COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Item Supplier ID") AS "Number of Vendors",
SUM("PO Item Total Amount") AS "Total Spend",
count(DISTINCT case_id) AS "Number of PO Items",
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Receive Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "% of Maverick buying"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Catalog item : Item from supplier with contract in place
Non Catalog item : Item from supplier with NO contract in place
Invoice Rejection Rate on Non Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) 
FILTER (WHERE "Last Invoice Reconciliation Status"  = 'Rejected'
AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog')/
count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total PO discount Amount on Catalog item

dataSource.query:
SELECT -SUM("PO Amount Discount") AS "Total PO discount Amount"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog'

children.name: Total PO discount Amount on Non Catalog item

dataSource.query:
SELECT -SUM("PO Amount Discount") AS "Total PO discount Amount"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog'

children.name: Total Spend Over Time by PO Item Type (Catalog vs. Non-Catalog)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME))) AS "Quarter",
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") AS "PO Item Total Amount", 
"PO Item Line Type"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog' OR "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog'
GROUP BY 1,3
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')
LIMIT 100

children.name: PO Rejection Rate on Non Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) 
FILTER (WHERE "PO Confirmation Status"  = 'Rejected'
AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'NonCatalog')/
count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: PO Rejection Rate on Catalog Items

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) 
FILTER (WHERE "PO Confirmation Status"  = 'Rejected'
AND "PO Item Line Type" = 'Catalog')/
count(distinct "Last Invoice Id" ) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: No. of Items by PO Item Line Type
Average Cycle time per supplier, item type and line Item

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    "PO Item Supplier ID" ,
    "PO Item Line Type" ,
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive PO Item')))
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "Average Cycle Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog','NonCatalog') AND 
"PO Item Supplier ID" IS NOT NULL 
AND "PO Item Line Type" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 3 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 300

children.name: PO Item line type deep dive into category and spending per suppliers

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"PO Item Category",
"PO Item Line Type",
"PO Item Supplier ID",
COUNT (DISTINCT "PO Item ID") AS "Number of PO Item",
COUNT (DISTINCT case_id) AS "Number of PO Line item",
SUM ("PO Item Total Amount") AS "Total Spend $",
SUM("Last Invoice Item Amount" ) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Invoice Payment Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Invoice Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())) AS "Total Open Invoice Amount $",
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Receive PO Item')))
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "Average Cycle Time",
SUM("Last Invoice Item Discount Amount") AS "Received Discount $"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Item Line Type" IN ('Catalog','NonCatalog') AND 
"PO Item Supplier ID" IS NOT NULL 
AND "PO Item Line Type" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
ORDER BY 4 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: Case Details
Quantity listed in PO, Last GR and Last Invoice
Case Details

blocks.text: This Page provides an overview of case specific deep dives by Quantity, Dates, Amount and POs

children.name: Date listed in PO, last GR and Last Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO ID",
case_id AS "PO Line item", 
"PO Ordered Date",
"PO Requested Delivery Date",
"Last GR Creation Date",
"Last GR Receipt Date",
"Last Invoice Accounting Date",
"Last Invoice Approval Date", 
"Last Invoice Created Date",
"Last Invoice Date", 
"Last Invoice Due Date",
"Last Invoice Payment Date",
"Last Invoice Reconciled Date",
"Last Invoice Submission Date"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Amount Deep dive

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Item Supplier ID",
case_id AS "PO Line Item", 
"PO Amount Accepted",
"PO Amount Billed",
"PO Amount Cleared",
"PO Amount Discount",
"PO Amount Left to Invoice",
"Invoice Item Amount", 
"Invoice Item Amount Accepted",
("Invoice Item Amount" - "Invoice Item Amount Accepted") AS "DIFF"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: PO Deep Dive

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Item Supplier ID",
case_id AS "PO line item",
"Last GR Line Item Id",
"Last GR Quantity",
"Last GR Quantity Accepted",
"Last GR Quantity Previously Accepted",
"Last Invoice Quantity",
"Last GR Item Unit Price",
"Receipt Item Unit Price",
("Receipt Item Unit Price"- "Last GR Item Unit Price") AS "Unit Price DIFF",
"PO Confirmation Status"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE "Receipt Item Unit Price" IS NOT NULL
